thread.title: Milton and Angie Cofer
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Milton and Angie Cofer

author: Milton and Angie Cofer
title: Milton and Angie Cofer
text: They were very helpful and friendly I love my new furniture and got a great deal I paid with cash and my husband counted it twice and so did one of the salesmen and we thought we had the exact amount another gentleman came over with a money sorter and since the money was so crisp it was stuck together pretty bad but thankful they were honest people cause we had over paid $40 I highly recommend this company..
